title: 1dsound
description: Program to create a sound file from a 1D file (column of numbers).

tsfile.title: Time series file
tsfile.description: The input 1D time series file containing the data to transform into sound.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for the output filename, which will have '.au' extension.

tper_option.title: Time per X-mod
tper_option.description: Time in seconds per time point in 'tsfile'. Allowed range is 0.01 to 1.0 (inclusive). [default is 0.2s]

fm_option.title: Frequency modulation
fm_option.description: Output sound is frequency modulated between 110 and 1760 Hz from min to max in the input 1D file.

notes_option.title: Notes option
notes_option.description: Output sound is a sequence of notes, low to high pitch based on min to max in the input 1D file. Uses pentatonic scale.

notewave_option.title: Note wave shape
notewave_option.description: Shape of the notes used. Select from [sine, sqsine, square, triangle].

despike_option.title: Despike
despike_option.description: Apply a simple despiking algorithm to avoid artifacts from large/small values in the input.

play_option.title: Play
play_option.description: Plays the sound file after it is written.
